Concierge Delivery Service

Up to 48 months interest free finance

We have partnered with V12 Retail Finance to offer you a quick, simple and 100% paperless process to access affordable finance options. For any queries during the application process, or when signing your credit agreement, contact us between 9.00am and 5.00pm Monday-Friday on 01491 876285 or concierge@bremont.com.

Read about our finance options

Every Bremont watch is mechanical and hand built in the UK

Great Britain has a wonderful history when it comes to watch making and has probably been the home to more advances in horology than any other nation. Bremont is determined to play a pivotal role in the reinvigoration of this industry on British shores and as a result, Bremont manufactures parts at its Parts Manufacturing Facility and every Bremont is hand-build and tested before leaving the Henley-on-Thames workshop.

We offer 3 a year warranty on every Bremont timepiece

Bremont focuses purely on beautifully made mechanical movements and every watch in our core collection has passed each of the rigorous precision tests necessary for the ISO 3159 chronometer designation. Every movement is finished to the highest levels of craftsmanship and all are guaranteed to within -4 and +6 seconds per day. For this reason Bremont is one of the few watch makers to offer a 3-year warranty on every timepiece.

More Information

Click & Collect

Buying one of our watches should always be a special experience. To help you, we are now pleased to be able to offer a click and collect service from selected Bremont boutiques worldwide.

Free delivery to the UK and Europe

At Bremont, we offer free delivery on all timepieces to the UK and Europe.

View all our delivery options

Concierge Delivery Service

We are also pleased to offer our new free of charge Concierge Delivery Service. Purchase any watch within the Greater London area, or across Hong Kong, and a Bremont concierge from your local boutique will personally deliver it to your door within four hours.

Description

So named after the boat their father lovingly hand-built for their mother, Bremont’s founding brothers Nick and Giles English expand their successful foray into women’s watches with the new Bremont SOLO “Lady K”. A precious nod to their mother and her artistic and adventurous spirit – which were of equal match to their father’s pilot profession – the compact 34mm timepiece builds upon the brand’s established aviation and military principles with elegance and finesse. And strikes a neat balance between being jewellery and timepiece. The model also follows the sell-out success of last year’s Bremont Hawking Quantum, the pioneering female model from the remarkable historic limited edition collection, then conceived with the Hawking family.


Diamonds have been used for the first time in Bremont’s core collection and feature both on the dial – as eight applied indices containing claw-set full-cut 1.3mm VS2 GH diamonds – and on the stainless-steel case, its bezel claw-set with a further 60 white brilliant cut 1.35mm VVS FG diamonds, their total carat weight 0.7ct. At Bremont, all diamonds are ethically sourced, following the Kimberley Process and are conflict free. The dial, in turn is available in either white mother of pearl of black Tahitian mother of pearl, the latter of which appropriately calls to mind pictures of the open sea, yet to be explored by boat. Due to the nature of the material each dial is unique.


Movement

Modified calibre 11 1/2’’’ BE-92AV automatic chronometer. 25 jewels. Glucydur balance. Anachron balance spring. Nivaflex 1 mainspring. 28,800 bph (4Hz). 42-hour power reserve. Bremont decorated rotor.

Technical Specification

FUNCTIONS
Hour/Minute/Second. Date at 6HR.

CASE
Polished stainless steel. Bremont Trip-Tick® construction with scratch resistant DLC treated case barrel. Bezel claw set with 60 white brilliant cut 1.35mm VVS FG Diamonds. Total carat weight 0.7ct. Case Diameter 34mm. Lug Width 16mm. Case Depth 10.5mm. 

CASE BACK
Stainless steel with integrated flat exhibition crystal, 4 stainless steel screws with polished heads.

DIAL & HANDS
White mother of pearl dial. Black Tahitian mother of pearl dial with 8 applied indices containing claw set full cut 1.3mm VS2 GH Diamonds. Hands in polished nickel.  

STRAP
16mm Stainless Steel, double deploying clasp, two tone adjustable bracelet. 

CRYSTAL
Domed anti-reflective, scratch resistant sapphire crystal. 

WATER RESISTANCE
10 ATM, 100 metres

RATING & CERTIFICATION
Chronometer rated to ISO 3159 standard 

Engineered in Britain

Bremont is determined to reinvigorate the engineering of timepieces in these shores and as such, each limited edition timepiece is hand-built by skilled watchmakers as it’s workshop in Henley-on-Thames, UK.

What's In the Box

The SOLO Lady K comes in a beautiful bridle leather roll. The box will include technical notes and warranty documentation.

Due to the nature of the mother of pearl, each of the SOLO Lady K dials will be entirely unique. This is the first time Bremont has introduced diamonds into a core range piece.


Nick English, Bremont Co-Founder

"Elegance and finesse combine with aviation principles"

The compact 34mm timepiece builds upon the brand's established aviation and military principles with elegance and finesse, striking a neat balance between being jewellery and timepiece. Nick recalls his mother sailing to Africa on The Lady K, and being a woman who was a strong as she was creative. The Bremont Lady K is a watch for women's lives lived well.

Function and Style

The domed anti-reflective sapphire crystal is scratch resistant and the piece comes with a stainless steel Bremont Trip-Tick® construction case, also scratch resistant.

Exquisite Craftsmanship

Boasting a 42-hour power reserve, the Lady K features the BE-92AV automatic chronometer-rated movement, with 25 jewels. The elegant 3 hand timepiece also features a date window at 6 o'clock.

Home Ladies' Watches SOLO Lady K White

Bremont Watch Company Limited acts as a credit broker and only offers products from Secure Trust Bank PLC trading as V12 Retail Finance. Bremont Watch Company Limited is authorised and regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority. Our registration number is 831284. Credit provided subject to age and status.
